Thecode, if you ever do something like that again, you're out. No 
matter how important it is, you can't break the rules, and what you 
did was moding. You've been warned. I hope you won't do something 
like that again.

::Prowl/Killer/Annihilator::

Iron Raptor nearly off-balances Prowl as she grabs on to his talons. 
He regains his balance, but then feels Iron Raptor grab his talons 
harder and harder.

"Please don't squash feet. I might need to use them." He says as he 
flies on toward their destanation, beating his wings often.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killer chuckles as Set tricks the predacon commander into leaving 
only one bot. He snarls to himself. One enemy in the ship could still 
be troube. He steps forward into the light, firing at Hell Beast's 
back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator chuckles as he enters the base behind Megatron. "That's 
what you think, drone!" He says, firing at the drone's behind.
